name: Black Shark - Flight Sim
description:
Black Shark is highly-realistic flight simulator of the Russian Ka-50 attack helicopter. Jump into the cockpit of Ka-50 helicopter and enjoy this beautiful flight and combat experience. Black Shark offers an extreme level of realism in regards to flight dynamics, sound effects, and weapon systems. You can roam the skies above various locations in Free Flight mode or enjoy the destruction power of the K-50 weapons in combat missions.

Main features:
- amazing high-res 3D graphics
- excellent flight physics and ground collision
- realistic sound effects
- detailed realistic 3D virtual cockpit with working HUD display. (you can look around and zoom in/out at anytime)
- fuel flow rate depending on the flight and RPM
- beautiful environment with sun & water effects
- gun, rockets, and missiles
- maximal, intuitive controls
- combat missions & free flight mode
- mini-map with steer points for better orientation
- technical support with upcoming new missions for free with updates
